text: Pamela Catherine Gidley (June 11, 1965 - April 16, 2018) was an American actress and model. She was born in Methuen, Massachusetts. Gidley was known for her role as Brigitte Parker in The Pretender and as Teri Miller on CSI: Crime Scene Investigation. She starred in David Lynch's Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me (1992) as Teresa Banks. Gidley died on April 16, 2018 in Seabrook, New Hampshire at the age of 52.L'actrice Pamela Gidley (Twin Peaks) est morte à l'âge de 52 ans ==References== ==Other websites== * * Pamela Gidley website (unofficial) Category:1965 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American video game actors Category:Models from Massachusetts Category:Actors from Massachusetts
title: Pamela Gidley
